chunk:
Admire My Skin Organic Antioxidant Serum

Brand: Admire My Skin

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA (DEIONIZED WATER), ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE (ORGANIC ALOE) LEAF JUICE, ROSA CANINA FRUIT OIL (ORGANIC ROSEHIP) SEED OIL, DIMETHYL SULFONE (MSM), SODIUM ASCORBYL PHOSPHATE (VITAMIN C), BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), OENOTHERA BIENN

ER), OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) SEED OIL, VACCINIUM MACROCARPON (CRANBERRY) SEED OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPESEED) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE), ORCHIS MACULATA (SPOTTED ORCHID) FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E), ALGAE EXTRACT, CAMELLIA SINENSIS (ORGANIC GREEN TEA) LEAF EXTRACT, VACCINIUM ANGUSTI

T, VACCINIUM ANGUSTIFOLIUM (BLUEBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, VACCINIUM MACROCARPON (ORGANIC CRANBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, CAMELLIA OLEIFERA (CAMELLIA) LEAF EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA (ORGANIC GOTU KOLA) EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVENSE (HORSETAIL PLANT) EXTRACT, GERANIUM MACULATUM (WILD GERANIUM) EXTRACT, TARAXACUM OFFICINALE (ORGANIC DANDELION) EXTRACT, GINKGO BIL

EXTRACT, GINKGO BILOBA (GINKGO) LEAF EXTRACT, SALVIA OFFICINALIS (SAGE) LEAF EXTRACT, SILYBUM MARIANUM (MILK THISTLE) EXTRACT, THYMUS VULGARIS (THYME) FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT, SCHISANDRA CHINENSIS (ORGANIC SCHISANDRA) FRUIT EXTRACT, PHENOXYETHANOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies
ns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
